short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sourcer AI uses cutting-edge AI to fact-check and summarize news articles, empowering users with clear and concise information!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you sick and tired of online misinformation? Well, we are too!

In an era dominated by the internet, the line between fact and fiction is often blurred. Misleading articles are spreading like wildfire, and things are only getting worse. With the average person flooded with an overwhelming amount of information, many find it challenging to carve out time for in-depth news consumption. Something must be done to help users traverse a digital landscape plagued with disinformation. 

The solution? Sourcer AI. Sourcer AI uses cutting edge artificial intelligence to summarize and analyze any online news source to find its reputability rating and political bias, helping consumers make quick, informed decisions in a world overflowing with misinformation. At Sourcer AI, we are committed to finding truth through innovation.

Sourcer AI automatically identifies your account for you, saving you the hassle of having to log in and out!

*To manage your subscription, refer to the Sourcer AI website*
